  314. ‌static ngx_str_t ngx_http_ssl_sess_id_ctx = ngx_string("HTTP");


  317. #ifdef TLSEXT_TYPE_application_layer_protocol_negotiation

  319. static int
  320. ‌ngx_http_ssl_alpn_select(ngx_ssl_conn_t *ssl_conn, const unsigned char **out,
  321.     unsigned char *outlen, const unsigned char *in, unsigned int inlen,
  322.     void *arg)
  323. {
  324.     unsigned int            srvlen;
  325.     unsigned char          *srv;
  326. #if (NGX_DEBUG)
  327.     unsigned int            i;
  328. #endif
  329. #if (NGX_HTTP_V2)
  330.     ngx_http_connection_t  *hc;
  331. #endif
  332. #if (NGX_HTTP_V2 || NGX_DEBUG)
  333.     ngx_connection_t       *c;

  335.     c = ngx_ssl_get_connection(ssl_conn);
  336. #endif

  338. #if (NGX_DEBUG)
  339.     for (i = 0; i < inlen; i += in[i] + 1) {
  340.         ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_HTTP, c->log, 0,
  341.                        "SSL ALPN supported by client: %*s",
  342.                        (size_t) in[i], &in[i + 1]);
  343.     }
  344. #endif

  346. #if (NGX_HTTP_V2)
  347.     hc = c->data;

  349.     if (hc->addr_conf->http2) {
  350.         srv =
  351.            (unsigned char *) NGX_HTTP_V2_ALPN_ADVERTISE NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE;
  352.         srvlen = sizeof(NGX_HTTP_V2_ALPN_ADVERTISE NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE) - 1;

  354.     } else
  355. #endif
  356.     {
  357.         srv = (unsigned char *) NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE;
  358.         srvlen = sizeof(NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE) - 1;
  359.     }

  361.     if (SSL_select_next_proto((unsigned char **) out, outlen, srv, srvlen,
  362.                               in, inlen)
  363.         != OPENSSL_NPN_NEGOTIATED)
  364.     {
  365.         return SSL_TLSEXT_ERR_NOACK;
  366.     }

  368.     ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_HTTP, c->log, 0,
  369.                    "SSL ALPN selected: %*s", (size_t) *outlen, *out);

  371.     return SSL_TLSEXT_ERR_OK;
  372. }

  374. #endif


  377. #ifdef TLSEXT_TYPE_next_proto_neg

  379. static int
  380. ‌ngx_http_ssl_npn_advertised(ngx_ssl_conn_t *ssl_conn,
  381.     const unsigned char **out, unsigned int *outlen, void *arg)
  382. {
  383. #if (NGX_HTTP_V2 || NGX_DEBUG)
  384.     ngx_connection_t  *c;

  386.     c = ngx_ssl_get_connection(ssl_conn);
  387.     ngx_log_debug0(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_HTTP, c->log, 0, "SSL NPN advertised");
  388. #endif

  390. #if (NGX_HTTP_V2)
  391.     {
  392.     ngx_http_connection_t  *hc;

  394.     hc = c->data;

  396.     if (hc->addr_conf->http2) {
  397.         *out =
  398.             (unsigned char *) NGX_HTTP_V2_NPN_ADVERTISE NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE;
  399.         *outlen = sizeof(NGX_HTTP_V2_NPN_ADVERTISE NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE) - 1;

  401.         return SSL_TLSEXT_ERR_OK;
  402.     }
  403.     }
  404. #endif

  406.     *out = (unsigned char *) NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE;
  407.     *outlen = sizeof(NGX_HTTP_NPN_ADVERTISE) - 1;

  409.     return SSL_TLSEXT_ERR_OK;
  410. }

  412. #endif


  415. static ngx_int_t
  416. ‌ngx_http_ssl_static_variable(ngx_http_request_t *r,
  417.     ngx_http_variable_value_t *v, uintptr_t data)
  418. {
  419.     ngx_ssl_variable_handler_pt  handler = (ngx_ssl_variable_handler_pt) data;

  421.     size_t     len;
  422.     ngx_str_t  s;

  424.     if (r->connection->ssl) {

  426.         (void) handler(r->connection, NULL, &s);

  428.         v->data = s.data;

  430.         for (len = 0; v->data[len]; len++) { /* void */ }

  432.         v->len = len;
  433.         v->valid = 1;
  434.         v->no_cacheable = 0;
  435.         v->not_found = 0;

  437.         return NGX_OK;
  438.     }

  440.     v->not_found = 1;

  442.     return NGX_OK;
  443. }


  446. static ngx_int_t
  447. ‌ngx_http_ssl_variable(ngx_http_request_t *r, ngx_http_variable_value_t *v,
  448.     uintptr_t data)
  449. {
  450.     ngx_ssl_variable_handler_pt  handler = (ngx_ssl_variable_handler_pt) data;

  452.     ngx_str_t  s;

  454.     if (r->connection->ssl) {

  456.         if (handler(r->connection, r->pool, &s) != NGX_OK) {
  457.             return NGX_ERROR;
  458.         }

  460.         v->len = s.len;
  461.         v->data = s.data;

  463.         if (v->len) {
  464.             v->valid = 1;
  465.             v->no_cacheable = 0;
  466.             v->not_found = 0;

  468.             return NGX_OK;
  469.         }
  470.     }

  472.     v->not_found = 1;

  474.     return NGX_OK;
  475. }


  478. static ngx_int_t
  479. ‌ngx_http_ssl_add_variables(ngx_conf_t *cf)
  480. {
  481.     ngx_http_variable_t  *var, *v;

  483.     for (v = ngx_http_ssl_vars; v->name.len; v++) {
  484.         var = ngx_http_add_variable(cf, &v->name, v->flags);
  485.         if (var == NULL) {
  486.             return NGX_ERROR;
  487.         }

  489.         var->get_handler = v->get_handler;
  490.         var->data = v->data;
  491.     }

  493.     return NGX_OK;
  494. }


  497. static void *
  498. ‌ngx_http_ssl_create_srv_conf(ngx_conf_t *cf)
  499. {
  500.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t  *sscf;

  502.     sscf = ngx_pcalloc(cf->pool, sizeof(ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t));
  503.     if (sscf == NULL) {
  504.         return NULL;
  505.     }

  507.     /*
  508.      * set by ngx_pcalloc():
  509.      *
  510.      *     sscf->protocols = 0;
  511.      *     sscf->dhparam = { 0, NULL };
  512.      *     sscf->ecdh_curve = { 0, NULL };
  513.      *     sscf->client_certificate = { 0, NULL };
  514.      *     sscf->trusted_certificate = { 0, NULL };
  515.      *     sscf->crl = { 0, NULL };
  516.      *     sscf->ciphers = { 0, NULL };
  517.      *     sscf->shm_zone = NULL;
  518.      *     sscf->stapling_file = { 0, NULL };
  519.      *     sscf->stapling_responder = { 0, NULL };
  520.      */

  522.     sscf->enable = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  523.     sscf->prefer_server_ciphers = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  524.     sscf->buffer_size = NGX_CONF_UNSET_SIZE;
  525.     sscf->verify = NGX_CONF_UNSET_UINT;
  526.     sscf->verify_depth = NGX_CONF_UNSET_UINT;
  527.     sscf->certificates = NGX_CONF_UNSET_PTR;
  528.     sscf->certificate_keys = NGX_CONF_UNSET_PTR;
  529.     sscf->passwords = NGX_CONF_UNSET_PTR;
  530.     sscf->builtin_session_cache = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  531.     sscf->session_timeout = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  532.     sscf->session_tickets = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  533.     sscf->session_ticket_keys = NGX_CONF_UNSET_PTR;
  534.     sscf->stapling = NGX_CONF_UNSET;
  535.     sscf->stapling_verify = NGX_CONF_UNSET;

  537.     return sscf;
  538. }


  541. static char *
  542. ‌ngx_http_ssl_merge_srv_conf(ngx_conf_t *cf, void *parent, void *child)
  543. {
  544.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t *prev = parent;
  545.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t *conf = child;

  547.     ngx_pool_cleanup_t  *cln;

  549.     if (conf->enable == NGX_CONF_UNSET) {
  550.         if (prev->enable == NGX_CONF_UNSET) {
  551.             conf->enable = 0;

  553.         } else {
  554.             conf->enable = prev->enable;
  555.             conf->file = prev->file;
  556.             conf->line = prev->line;
  557.         }
  558.     }

  560.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->session_timeout,
  561.                          prev->session_timeout, 300);

  563.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->prefer_server_ciphers,
  564.                          prev->prefer_server_ciphers, 0);

  566.     ngx_conf_merge_bitmask_value(conf->protocols, prev->protocols,
  567.                          (NGX_CONF_BITMASK_SET|NGX_SSL_TLSv1
  568.                           |NGX_SSL_TLSv1_1|NGX_SSL_TLSv1_2));

  570.     ngx_conf_merge_size_value(conf->buffer_size, prev->buffer_size,
  571.                          NGX_SSL_BUFSIZE);

  573.     ngx_conf_merge_uint_value(conf->verify, prev->verify, 0);
  574.     ngx_conf_merge_uint_value(conf->verify_depth, prev->verify_depth, 1);

  576.     ngx_conf_merge_ptr_value(conf->certificates, prev->certificates, NULL);
  577.     ngx_conf_merge_ptr_value(conf->certificate_keys, prev->certificate_keys,
  578.                          NULL);

  580.     ngx_conf_merge_ptr_value(conf->passwords, prev->passwords, NULL);

  582.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->dhparam, prev->dhparam, "");

  584.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->client_certificate, prev->client_certificate,
  585.                          "");
  586.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->trusted_certificate,
  587.                          prev->trusted_certificate, "");
  588.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->crl, prev->crl, "");

  590.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->ecdh_curve, prev->ecdh_curve,
  591.                          NGX_DEFAULT_ECDH_CURVE);

  593.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->ciphers, prev->ciphers, NGX_DEFAULT_CIPHERS);

  595.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->stapling, prev->stapling, 0);
  596.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->stapling_verify, prev->stapling_verify, 0);
  597.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->stapling_file, prev->stapling_file, "");
  598.     ngx_conf_merge_str_value(conf->stapling_responder,
  599.                          prev->stapling_responder, "");

  601.     conf->ssl.log = cf->log;

  603.     if (conf->enable) {

  605.         if (conf->certificates == NULL) {
  606.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf->log, 0,
  607.                           "no \"ssl_certificate\" is defined for "
  608.                           "the \"ssl\" directive in %s:%ui",
  609.                           conf->file, conf->line);
  610.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  611.         }

  613.         if (conf->certificate_keys == NULL) {
  614.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf->log, 0,
  615.                           "no \"ssl_certificate_key\" is defined for "
  616.                           "the \"ssl\" directive in %s:%ui",
  617.                           conf->file, conf->line);
  618.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  619.         }

  621.         if (conf->certificate_keys->nelts < conf->certificates->nelts) {
  622.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf->log, 0,
  623.                           "no \"ssl_certificate_key\" is defined "
  624.                           "for certificate \"%V\" and "
  625.                           "the \"ssl\" directive in %s:%ui",
  626.                           ((ngx_str_t *) conf->certificates->elts)
  627.                           + conf->certificates->nelts - 1,
  628.                           conf->file, conf->line);
  629.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  630.         }

  632.     } else {

  634.         if (conf->certificates == NULL) {
  635.             return NGX_CONF_OK;
  636.         }

  638.         if (conf->certificate_keys == NULL
  639.             || conf->certificate_keys->nelts < conf->certificates->nelts)
  640.         {
  641.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf->log, 0,
  642.                           "no \"ssl_certificate_key\" is defined "
  643.                           "for certificate \"%V\"",
  644.                           ((ngx_str_t *) conf->certificates->elts)
  645.                           + conf->certificates->nelts - 1);
  646.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  647.         }
  648.     }

  650.     if (ngx_ssl_create(&conf->ssl, conf->protocols, conf) != NGX_OK) {
  651.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  652.     }

  654. #ifdef SSL_CTRL_SET_TLSEXT_HOSTNAME

  656.     if (SSL_CTX_set_tlsext_servername_callback(conf->ssl.ctx,
  657.                                                ngx_http_ssl_servername)
  658.         == 0)
  659.     {
  660.         ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_WARN, cf->log, 0,
  661.             "nginx was built with SNI support, however, now it is linked "
  662.             "dynamically to an OpenSSL library which has no tlsext support, "
  663.             "therefore SNI is not available");
  664.     }

  666. #endif

  668. #ifdef TLSEXT_TYPE_application_layer_protocol_negotiation
  669.     SSL_CTX_set_alpn_select_cb(conf->ssl.ctx, ngx_http_ssl_alpn_select, NULL);
  670. #endif

  672. #ifdef TLSEXT_TYPE_next_proto_neg
  673.     SSL_CTX_set_next_protos_advertised_cb(conf->ssl.ctx,
  674.                                           ngx_http_ssl_npn_advertised, NULL);
  675. #endif

  677.     cln = ngx_pool_cleanup_add(cf->pool, 0);
  678.     if (cln == NULL) {
  679.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  680.     }

  682.     cln->handler = ngx_ssl_cleanup_ctx;
  683.     cln->data = &conf->ssl;

  685.     if (ngx_ssl_certificates(cf, &conf->ssl, conf->certificates,
  686.                              conf->certificate_keys, conf->passwords)
  687.         != NGX_OK)
  688.     {
  689.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  690.     }

  692.     if (ngx_ssl_ciphers(cf, &conf->ssl, &conf->ciphers,
  693.                         conf->prefer_server_ciphers)
  694.         != NGX_OK)
  695.     {
  696.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  697.     }

  699.     conf->ssl.buffer_size = conf->buffer_size;

  701.     if (conf->verify) {

  703.         if (conf->client_certificate.len == 0 && conf->verify != 3) {
  704.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf->log, 0,
  705.                           "no ssl_client_certificate for ssl_client_verify");
  706.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  707.         }

  709.         if (ngx_ssl_client_certificate(cf, &conf->ssl,
  710.                                        &conf->client_certificate,
  711.                                        conf->verify_depth)
  712.             != NGX_OK)
  713.         {
  714.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  715.         }
  716.     }

  718.     if (ngx_ssl_trusted_certificate(cf, &conf->ssl,
  719.                                     &conf->trusted_certificate,
  720.                                     conf->verify_depth)
  721.         != NGX_OK)
  722.     {
  723.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  724.     }

  726.     if (ngx_ssl_crl(cf, &conf->ssl, &conf->crl) != NGX_OK) {
  727.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  728.     }

  730.     if (ngx_ssl_dhparam(cf, &conf->ssl, &conf->dhparam) != NGX_OK) {
  731.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  732.     }

  734.     if (ngx_ssl_ecdh_curve(cf, &conf->ssl, &conf->ecdh_curve) != NGX_OK) {
  735.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  736.     }

  738.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->builtin_session_cache,
  739.                          prev->builtin_session_cache, NGX_SSL_NONE_SCACHE);

  741.     if (conf->shm_zone == NULL) {
  742.         conf->shm_zone = prev->shm_zone;
  743.     }

  745.     if (ngx_ssl_session_cache(&conf->ssl, &ngx_http_ssl_sess_id_ctx,
  746.                               conf->builtin_session_cache,
  747.                               conf->shm_zone, conf->session_timeout)
  748.         != NGX_OK)
  749.     {
  750.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  751.     }

  753.     ngx_conf_merge_value(conf->session_tickets, prev->session_tickets, 1);

  755. #ifdef SSL_OP_NO_TICKET
  756.     if (!conf->session_tickets) {
  757.         SSL_CTX_set_options(conf->ssl.ctx, SSL_OP_NO_TICKET);
  758.     }
  759. #endif

  761.     ngx_conf_merge_ptr_value(conf->session_ticket_keys,
  762.                          prev->session_ticket_keys, NULL);

  764.     if (ngx_ssl_session_ticket_keys(cf, &conf->ssl, conf->session_ticket_keys)
  765.         != NGX_OK)
  766.     {
  767.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  768.     }

  770.     if (conf->stapling) {

  772.         if (ngx_ssl_stapling(cf, &conf->ssl, &conf->stapling_file,
  773.                              &conf->stapling_responder, conf->stapling_verify)
  774.             != NGX_OK)
  775.         {
  776.             return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  777.         }

  779.     }

  781.     return NGX_CONF_OK;
  782. }


  785. static char *
  786. ‌ngx_http_ssl_enable(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf)
  787. {
  788.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t *sscf = conf;

  790.     char  *rv;

  792.     rv = ngx_conf_set_flag_slot(cf, cmd, conf);

  794.     if (rv != NGX_CONF_OK) {
  795.         return rv;
  796.     }

  798.     sscf->file = cf->conf_file->file.name.data;
  799.     sscf->line = cf->conf_file->line;

  801.     return NGX_CONF_OK;
  802. }


  805. static char *
  806. ‌ngx_http_ssl_password_file(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf)
  807. {
  808.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t *sscf = conf;

  810.     ngx_str_t  *value;

  812.     if (sscf->passwords != NGX_CONF_UNSET_PTR) {
  813.         return "is duplicate";
  814.     }

  816.     value = cf->args->elts;

  818.     sscf->passwords = ngx_ssl_read_password_file(cf, &value[1]);

  820.     if (sscf->passwords == NULL) {
  821.         return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  822.     }

  824.     return NGX_CONF_OK;
  825. }


  828. static char *
  829. ‌ngx_http_ssl_session_cache(ngx_conf_t *cf, ngx_command_t *cmd, void *conf)
  830. {
  831.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t *sscf = conf;

  833.     size_t       len;
  834.     ngx_str_t   *value, name, size;
  835.     ngx_int_t    n;
  836.     ngx_uint_t   i, j;

  838.     value = cf->args->elts;

  840.     for (i = 1; i < cf->args->nelts; i++) {

  842.         if (ngx_strcmp(value[i].data, "off") == 0) {
  843.             sscf->builtin_session_cache = NGX_SSL_NO_SCACHE;
  844.             continue;
  845.         }

  847.         if (ngx_strcmp(value[i].data, "none") == 0) {
  848.             sscf->builtin_session_cache = NGX_SSL_NONE_SCACHE;
  849.             continue;
  850.         }

  852.         if (ngx_strcmp(value[i].data, "builtin") == 0) {
  853.             sscf->builtin_session_cache = NGX_SSL_DFLT_BUILTIN_SCACHE;
  854.             continue;
  855.         }

  857.         if (value[i].len > sizeof("builtin:") - 1
  858.             && ngx_strncmp(value[i].data, "builtin:", sizeof("builtin:") - 1)
  859.                == 0)
  860.         {
  861.             n = ngx_atoi(value[i].data + sizeof("builtin:") - 1,
  862.                          value[i].len - (sizeof("builtin:") - 1));

  864.             if (n == NGX_ERROR) {
  865.                 goto invalid;
  866.             }

  868.             sscf->builtin_session_cache = n;

  870.             continue;
  871.         }

  873.         if (value[i].len > sizeof("shared:") - 1
  874.             && ngx_strncmp(value[i].data, "shared:", sizeof("shared:") - 1)
  875.                == 0)
  876.         {
  877.             len = 0;

  879.             for (j = sizeof("shared:") - 1; j < value[i].len; j++) {
  880.                 if (value[i].data[j] == ':') {
  881.                     break;
  882.                 }

  884.                 len++;
  885.             }

  887.             if (len == 0) {
  888.                 goto invalid;
  889.             }

  891.             name.len = len;
  892.             name.data = value[i].data + sizeof("shared:") - 1;

  894.             size.len = value[i].len - j - 1;
  895.             size.data = name.data + len + 1;

  897.             n = ngx_parse_size(&size);

  899.             if (n == NGX_ERROR) {
  900.                 goto invalid;
  901.             }

  903.             if (n < (ngx_int_t) (8 * ngx_pagesize)) {
  904.                 ngx_conf_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf, 0,
  905.                                    "session cache \"%V\" is too small",
  906.                                    &value[i]);

  908.                 return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  909.             }

  911.             sscf->shm_zone = ngx_shared_memory_add(cf, &name, n,
  912.                                                    &ngx_http_ssl_module);
  913.             if (sscf->shm_zone == NULL) {
  914.                 return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  915.             }

  917.             sscf->shm_zone->init = ngx_ssl_session_cache_init;

  919.             continue;
  920.         }

  922.         goto invalid;
  923.     }

  925.     if (sscf->shm_zone && sscf->builtin_session_cache == NGX_CONF_UNSET) {
  926.         sscf->builtin_session_cache = NGX_SSL_NO_BUILTIN_SCACHE;
  927.     }

  929.     return NGX_CONF_OK;

  931. invalid:

  933.     ngx_conf_log_error(NGX_LOG_EMERG, cf, 0,
  934.                        "invalid session cache \"%V\"", &value[i]);

  936.     return NGX_CONF_ERROR;
  937. }


  940. static ngx_int_t
  941. ‌ngx_http_ssl_init(ngx_conf_t *cf)
  942. {
  943.     ngx_uint_t                   s;
  944.     ngx_http_ssl_srv_conf_t     *sscf;
  945.     ngx_http_core_loc_conf_t    *clcf;
  946.     ngx_http_core_srv_conf_t   **cscfp;
  947.     ngx_http_core_main_conf_t   *cmcf;

  949.     cmcf = ngx_http_conf_get_module_main_conf(cf, ngx_http_core_module);
  950.     cscfp = cmcf->servers.elts;

  952.     for (s = 0; s < cmcf->servers.nelts; s++) {

  954.         sscf = cscfp[s]->ctx->srv_conf[ngx_http_ssl_module.ctx_index];

  956.         if (sscf->ssl.ctx == NULL || !sscf->stapling) {
  957.             continue;
  958.         }

  960.         clcf = cscfp[s]->ctx->loc_conf[ngx_http_core_module.ctx_index];

  962.         if (ngx_ssl_stapling_resolver(cf, &sscf->ssl, clcf->resolver,
  963.                                       clcf->resolver_timeout)
  964.             != NGX_OK)
  965.         {
  966.             return NGX_ERROR;
  967.         }
  968.     }

  970.     return NGX_OK;
  971. }

One Level Up Top Level
